subject: Golf
Women and Girls
lead_paragraph: Annika Sorenstam did not make the cut when she played on the men’s golf tour at the 2003 Colonial, but appreciation of her appearance has grown in the 10 years since.
snippet: Annika Sorenstam did not make the cut when she played on the men’s golf tour at the 2003 Colonial, but appreciation of her appearance has grown in the 10 years since.
